description.brief: ROS integration for the Nao humanoid robot (drivers / wrappers and messages).
description.p: The nao_robot stack contains some useful nodes to integrated the Nao humanoid robot into ROS, developed at the Humanoid Robots Lab at the Albert-Ludwigs-Unversitaet in Freiburg, Germany. It provides basic functionality and can be installed on the robot. It should be used with the nao_common stack for more functionality. The humanoid_navigation stack contains some more general packages for humanoid / biped robots.
File downloads and development are at GitHub: https://github.com/ahornung/nao_robot, documentation at http://www.ros.org/wiki/nao_robot.
